model

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    World class which contains the different object which compose our model

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Element> elementList
      ArrayList elementList contains all elements which doesn't move such as background, gold, energyBubble and wall could possibly contains all elements allows the use of getter to find the position and the sprite of the objects
      private java.util.ArrayList<Ennemy> ennemyList
      ArrayList ennemyList contains the list of ennemy
      private java.util.ArrayList<IDisappear> erasableList
      ArrayList erasableList contains all elements which can be erased such as gold, energyBubble, spell and ennemy allows the use of the method disappear
      private ExitDoor exitDoor
      ExitDoor exitDoor
      private Hero hero
      Hero hero
      private java.util.ArrayList<IPermeable> immobileList
      ArrayList immobileList contains all elements which doesn't move such as background, gold, energyBubble and wall allows the use of Getter to find the Permeability of the objects
      private int nbrEnnemy
      nbrEnnemy = 1 allows to define different sprite for each ennemy
